48.name: Skelk Slayer
48.description: These tricky hunters learned the hard way you were the most dangerous game.

60.name: Pistol Master
60.description: You dispense death from the palm of your hand.
60.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a pistol.

79.name: Some Must Fight, That All May Be Free
79.description: You have become a full member of the Vigil.
79.requirement: Complete the story step "Minister's Defense" or "Quaestor's Siege."

114.name: Chosen
114.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
114.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

121.name: Dungeons Discovered
121.description: Chasing evil out of the dark places where it hides.

bits.text: The Ruined City of Arah Story

160.name: Spelunker's Delve
160.description: Find the way through Spelunker's Delve.

248.name: Mercenary
248.description: You aren't a total liability anymore.

268.name: Genius
268.description: No problem your gadgets can't solve!

285.name: A Pack Dolyak's Best Friend
285.description: Caravans have nothing to fear when you're around.

322.name: Stopped Them Cold
322.description: Towers are easy to defend once you know how it's done!

348.name: Magellan's Memento
348.requirement: Uncover the riches that doomed Francis Magellan.

351.name: The Long Way Around
351.description: Fryxx will know if you take the short way around.
351.requirement: Find a way to reach Fryxx.

354.name: Grounded
354.description: It's more of a dirge than an anthem, really.
354.requirement: Recover lost valuables within a beached ship.

373.name: Chicken Scramble
373.requirement: Get transformed into a chicken by the Skritt Burglar.

387.name: Uncategorized Fractal Stabilizer
387.requirement: You've completed the Uncategorized fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

402.name: PvP Daily Matches Played
402.description: Win or lose, you see it through to the end.

420.name: Honorary Krewe Member
420.description: You must be this smart to enter.
420.requirement: Help out at Tixx's workshop in Rata Sum.

481.name: Dungeon Completer
481.requirement: Complete a dungeon on explorable mode difficulty.

646.name: Daily WvW World Ranker
646.requirement: Gain World Rank in World versus World.

669.name: Mad Cache
669.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in Goemm's Lab in Metrica Province.

750.name: Southsun Survival: Master Marksman
750.requirement: Use Head Shot successfully against opponents in Southsun Survival.

774.name: Champion of the Colleges
774.requirement: Represent Rata Sum in the Crown Pavilion. Escort asuran emissaries to hot-air balloons.

1071.name: Toxic Pollen Survival
1071.requirement: Survive in toxic pollen for  pulses.

1093.name: Toxic Weed Whacker
1093.requirement: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1094.name: Toxic Demolitionist Gardener
1094.requirement: Use explosives to bring down a toxic offshoot.

1103.name: The Nightmares Within
1103.requirement: Complete  event inside the Tower of Nightmares.

1227.name: Aftermath Toxic Offshoot Finisher II
1227.requirement: Finish  enemies using the Toxic Offshoot Finisher.

1235.name: Aftermath Toxic Boss Slayer III
1235.requirement: Defeat the toxic spider queen, toxic wurm queen, toxic alchemist, or toxic warlock.

1247.name: Honorary Krewe Member
1247.description: You must be this smart to enter.
1247.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's workshop in Lion's Arch.

1358.name: Boss Thumper XXI
1358.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1366.name: Hold Your Breath
1366.requirement: Equip a pair of diving goggles, jump off the top of Tytone Perch, and land in a bucket of water.

1408.name: Executive Execution
1408.requirement: Kill an Aetherblade Elite Group, Molten Berserker, or Toxic Wurm Queen in Lion's Arch.

1589.name: Sky Crystal Master
1589.requirement: Locate  master sky crystal in the Labyrinthine Cliffs.

1701.name: Power Squelcher
1701.requirement: Defeat the Mordrem leyleecher after it's reached full power.

1804.name: The Be-All and the End-All
1804.requirement: Slay the Legendary Mordrem Tormentor, Legendary Mordrem Executioner, Legendary Mordrem Demolisher, and Legendary Mordrem Annihilator.

1867.name: Daily PvP Capture
1867.description: This looks like a nice spot for a picnic.
1867.requirement: Help capture a point in a PvP match.

1873.name: Daily Forgotten Stream Minidungeon
1873.requirement: Complete the Forgotten Stream minidungeon in Cursed Shore.

1942.name: Daily Straits of Devastation Event Completer
1942.requirement: Complete events in the Straits of Devastation in Orr.

2038.name: Winter Wonderland Mastery
2038.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle  time.

2051.name: Luminescent Headgear
2051.requirement: Collect the  parts required to assemble a piece of Luminescent headgear.

2255.name: Fix-r-Upper
2255.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the scrapper's hammer, Fix-r-Upper.
2255.locked_text: Begin training the engineer's scrapper elite specialization.

bits.text: Purchased from Rebel Isaak in Frostgorge Sound.
Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2272.name: Adept Daredevil
2272.requirement: Begin training the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

2374.name: The Moot III: The Energizer
2374.description: After the successful hunt comes the celebration, when all the pent-up energy of the battle is released in food and song. Drink, dine, dance, and revel across the land of Tyria in your journey to attain the legendary precursor known as the Energizer.

bits.text: Dropped by Taidha Covington in Bloodtide Coast.
Dropped by the Fire Elementals in Metrica Province and Iron Marches.
Dropped by the Jungle Wurm in Caledon Forest.
Dropped by Modniir Ulgoth in Harathi Hinterlands.
Dropped by the Karka Queen in Southsun Cove.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchase this recipe from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
Purchased from Arcanist Vance in the ruins of the Granite Citadel in Dredgehaunt Cliffs after helping him study the Dwarven relics.
Found tangled up in coral found around the Orrian peninsula.
Purchased from Scholar Tholin in Timberline Falls after partaking of the moot.
Purchased from Shelp in Blazeridge Steppes after helping the peaceful ogres of Degun Shun.
Purchased from Oxnard Bonestrap in the Village of Butcher's Block in Diessa Plateau after participating in Meatoberfest.
Honor Owl, Wolverine, and Ox by pouring out a Draught of Hunter's Ale at their shrines.
Dance in front of the statue of Abaddon in the Durmand Priory's secret archives.
Dance for Balthazar at the Altar of Balthazar, in his Temple in Orr.
Dance for Dwayna at the Altar of Dwayna, in her Temple in Orr.
Show off your dance moves to Evon Gnashblade in Lion's Arch.
Dance for Grenth at the Altar of Grenth, in his Temple in Orr.
Dance for Lyssa at the Altar of Lyssa, in her Temple in Orr.
Dance for Melandru at the Altar of Melandru, in her Temple in Orr.
Show off your dance moves to Jennah, Queen of Kryta.
Show off your dance moves to the King of the Skritt in Brisban Wildlands.
Dance within the walls of a jail cell.
Set off fireworks at Bearstone Shrine in Lornar's Pass.
Set off fireworks at Ravenbeak Shrine in Lornar's Pass.
Set off fireworks at Leopardshadow Shrine in Lornar's Pass.
Set off fireworks at Wolfpaw Shrine in Lornar's Pass.
Show your respect for the power of Dragon by saluting the dragon totem at the center of The Barrowstead in Frostgorge Sound.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2396.name: Tangled Depths Insight: Northern Confluence
2396.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Tangled Depths.

2489.name: Jungle Totem Hunter
2489.description: No, you don't have to carry them all the way back...
2489.requirement: Discover all the lost Itzel totems in Verdant Brink.

2496.name: Mouth of Mordremoth Master
2496.requirement: Slay the Mouth of Mordremoth in Dragon's Stand in under 20 minutes.

2505.name: "Lethal Vantage" Strongbox
2505.requirement: Search in the Creeping Crevasse area for the strongbox from the "Lethal Vantage."

2527.name: The Predator's Path
2527.requirement: Catch up with the rest of your team.

2560.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 10
2560.requirement: Complete  scale 10 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2605.name: Bat Wrangler
2605.description: Is there anything you can't wrangle?
2605.requirement: Help the ogres in Dragon's Stand reclaim their lost pets.

2629.name: Machined Hammer
2629.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Hammer.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2657.name: Closure
2657.requirement: Collect all soldier tags from the fallen.

2694.name: League Slayer—Veteran
2694.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.

2702.name: League Mesmer—Champion
2702.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Champion achievement.
2702.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as a mesmer.

2780.name: Seasoned Toymaker
2780.description: Getting into the spirit of the season.
2780.requirement: Show your seasonal spirit by completing these achievements.

2794.name: Finders Keepers
2794.description: Your greed ruined someone else's Wintersday. Jerk.
2794.requirement: Pick up a dropped present while escorting a donation dolyak in Divinity's Reach.

2851.name: Environmental Science 101
2851.requirement: Smash the honeycomb in World 1, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2881.name: Mineral Resource Extraction 202
2881.requirement: Dig up three bauble chests in World 2, Zone 2 of Super Adventure Box.

2923.name: Daily Tier 4 Solid Ocean
2923.requirement: Complete Solid Ocean at fractal scale 76 or higher.

2964.name: Daily Tier 3 Aquatic Ruins
2964.requirement: Complete Aquatic Ruins at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3006.name: Ley-Line Research
3006.requirement: Assist the Priory in collecting accumulated ley energy.

3022.name: I Can Outrun A...Warg
3022.requirement: Siege the stronghold in under 8 minutes.

3069.name: Opportunist
3069.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during rated Revenge of the Capricorn matches.

3081.name: Magic Unbound: The Gathering
3081.requirement: Collect 10 units of floating unbound magic in 60 seconds.

3176.name: Daily Bitterfrost Frontier Elixir Addiction
3176.requirement: Obtain cold resistance from the thaw elixir.

3199.name: Retrieval Squad
3199.requirement: Find all the corpses of the adventuring party that preceded you.

3254.name: Silver for the Season
3254.requirement: Donate silver to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

3259.name: Dolyak Defender
3259.description: This dolyak WILL make it to deliver the presents today.
3259.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak.

3275.name: Dragon Ball Champion
3275.description: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

3359.name: Victory in Niflhel
3359.description: You must defeat both your enemy and the forest itself.
3359.requirement: Win  rated match in the Forest of Niflhel.

3384.name: Niflhel Defender
3384.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during Forest of Niflhel rated matches.

3388.name: Shards of a Thorn
3388.requirement: Locate sword fragments within the Maguuma Jungle to aid in the restoration of Caladbolg.

3396.name: Elder Druid Protection
3396.requirement: Find the imprisoned druids and gain their blessings.

3441.name: Fire Fighter
3441.description:
Story Instance: Taimi's Pet Project

"Save the research!"
3441.requirement: Repair three of Taimi's malfunctioning sprinklers.

3534.name: Dredgehaunt Cliffs Insight: Dostoev Sky Peak
3534.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

3611.name: Defector Protector
3611.description: Oasis camps in the Riverlands form a secret network for exiles fleeing Joko's kingdom for Amnoon.
3611.requirement: Convince all ten restless exiles to leave the Arid Gladefields for the same trip, and ensure all defectors reach the oasis camp to the north.

3640.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Giant's Bough
3640.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3718.name: Refugee Supply Run: Silver
3718.requirement: Gather relief supplies for the refugees before time runs out!

3728.name: Honoring the Fallen
3728.requirement: Bow at Sandstrewn Shrine to summon First Spear Dehvad, and collect medals from him for completing his tasks.

3790.name: Elon Riverlands Legendary Bounties
3790.requirement: Defeat each Legendary bounty in the Elon Riverlands at least once.

3888.name: Daily Desert Miner
3888.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
3888.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following locations: Crystal Oasis, the Desert Highlands, Elon Riverlands, the Desolation, or the Domain of Vabbi.

4016.name: What's Death May Never Die
4016.description: There is no conclusion more natural than death.
4016.requirement: Defeat the Voice in the Void.

4028.name: Daily Tier 1 Twilight Oasis
4028.requirement: Complete Twilight Oasis at fractal scale 1 or higher.

4046.name: (Annual) Age of Toypocalypse
4046.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4050.name: Glacial Weapon Collection
4050.requirement: Unlock all  Glacial weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4074.name: Firecracker Finder
4074.requirement: Find and light all of the firecrackers in the Crown Pavilion.

4078.name: Light Up the Sky
4078.requirement: Set off  Lunar New Year fireworks.

4081.name: (Annual) Celestial Racer
4081.requirement: Complete the race event or time trial adventure in Divinity's Reach during Lunar New Year in under 3 minutes and 30 seconds. This achievement can be completed once a year.

4103.name: Repairing IG-6417
4103.requirement: Acquire the parts to repair IG-6417.

bits.text: Acquire a replacement golem arm from the Inquest and use it to repair IG-6417.
Acquire a replacement golem arm from the Inquest and use it to repair IG-6417.
Find integrated circuitry from the Specimen Chamber and use it to repair IG-6417.
Find a replacement optical sensor among the birds of Sandswept Isles to repair IG-6417.
Salvage a gravitic repulsion unit from an Inquest golem and use it to repair IG-6417.
Salvage a holographic display unit from an Inquest golem and use it to repair IG-6417.
Salvage a power core from the Inquest Mark III Suppressor Golem and use it to repair IG-6417.

4145.name: Impressionable Youth
4145.requirement: Convince the cubs about the way they can best help their village.

4153.name: (Annual) World 2 Warm-Up
4153.description: If you never walk, you'll never see all the scenery.
4153.requirement: Play Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2 in Exploration Mode.

bits.text: Complete World 2, Zone 1 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 2, Zone 2 in Exploration Mode.
Complete World 2, Zone 3 in Exploration Mode.

4231.name: I Can See My House...
4231.requirement: Show your roller beetle the view from the highest point in Kourna.

4244.name: Daily Tier 1 Deepstone
4244.requirement: Complete Deepstone at fractal scale 1 or higher.

4245.name: [FTT 207] Intermediate Dynamics—Gravimetric Tunneling Field Oscillator Level 2
4245.requirement: Built / Gravimetric Tunneling Field Oscillator Level 1 Turrets

4317.name: Faster than Four Winds
4317.requirement: Finish a festival race event or adventure in Labyrinthine Cliffs or Crown Pavilion.

4318.name: No One Likes a Wet Charr
4318.requirement: Throw a water balloon at Evon Gnashblade and get him soaked.

4331.name: Four Winds Gale
4331.requirement: Complete the Four Winds Zephyr achievement five times over the course of the Festival of the Four Winds. The Four Winds Zephyr achievement is located in the Festival of the Four Winds Daily tab.

4385.name: Jahai Bluffs Griffon Master: Gold
4385.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

4449.name: (Annual) Lunatic Racer
4449.requirement: Complete the race event in Mad King's Labyrinth in under two minutes. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4475.name: Daily Racer: Tropic Valley Raceway
4475.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Brisban Wildlands. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4510.name: Electrophobia
4510.requirement: Complete the Crystal Dragon without taking damage from environmental hazards.

4512.name: Chasing Tales: Bloodthirst
4512.description: Harkon Hakson was known for a sort of joyous brutality.
4512.requirement: Use an axe to slay 30 enemies in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with an axe in Thunderhead Peaks.

4553.name: Star Fishing
4553.requirement: Use dredge fishing techniques to land a fish in a basket.

4578.name: Thunderhead Peaks Insight: Sorrow's Cave
4578.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Thunderhead Peaks.

4580.name: Chasing Tales: Feed the Beast
4580.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a dagger in Thunderhead Peak.

bits.text: Learned of Belitrea the Blade of Want.
Defeated 30 enemies with daggers in Thunderhead Peak.

4583.name: Chasing Tales: Cry Havoc
4583.description: "I hate that guy. But I LOVE that song."
4583.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a warhorn in Thunderhead Peaks.

4592.name: Chasing Tales: Outlaw
4592.description: Durio was the victor of countless duels.
4592.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a pistol in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Killed 30 enemies with a pistol in Thunderhead Peaks.

4622.name: Chasing Tales: Shooting Star
4622.description: Mirren's ambitions fueled his ascent—and his fall.
4622.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a scepter in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a scepter in Thunderhead Peaks.

4675.name: Troublesome Skyscales
4675.locked_text: Unlocks a short time after completing the Raising Skyscales collection.

4786.name: Knight of the Arena
4786.requirement: Finish the season in 101st–250th on the skill rating leaderboard.

4840.name: I Can Outrun a Dragon
4840.requirement: Complete a lap of the mount race in Hoelbrak within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4926.name: Heads up!
4926.requirement: Get hit by falling props during the concert.

5017.name: Raven's Favor
5017.requirement: Claim victory in the Storms of Winter.

5054.name: East Bjora Marches Treasure Hunter
5054.requirement: Open all of the norn chests in East Bjora Marches.

5070.name: Daily Bonus Rewards: Snowfall Sprint Race
5070.requirement: Complete the race event in Divinity's Reach during Wintersday.

5136.name: Whisper Boxing
5136.requirement: Dodge, evade, or avoid all of the Whisper of Jormag's Rimebreath and Icicle attacks.

5215.name: Visions of the Past: North Nolan Hatchery
5215.requirement: Find a memento of a past battle in the North Nolan Hatchery in Diessa Plateau.

5222.name: Artillery Specialist
5222.requirement: Defeat the opposition with your tank.

5235.name: Visions of the Past: Lair Light-Foot
5235.description: Defeat Canach's Lair without getting caught in any traps. [Living World Season 1: Canach's Lair vision. Accessed via the Scrying Pool in Eye of the North.]

5336.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: Vulpine Road
5336.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5389.name: Flight of the Eagle Spirit: Silver
5389.requirement: Complete the Flight of the Eagle Spirit adventure with a silver or better ranking.

5440.name: Raging Fire
5440.requirement: On the Master tier, defeat the final boss without being hit by Firestorm. Death removes eligibility.

5446.name: Daily Tier 4 Sunqua Peak
5446.requirement: Complete Sunqua Peak at fractal scale 76 or higher.

5502.name: Champions Insight: Snowden Drifts
5502.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Snowden Drifts Dragon Response Mission, accessed via asura gate in Eye of the North.

5691.name: Tide Turner: Caledon Forest
5691.requirement: During the Dragon Response Mission, aid each recruited faction at least once while a challenge is active.

5730.name: Crop Harvester: Silverwastes
5730.requirement: Harvest plants  times in the Silverwastes.

5876.name: Return to Pointed Parley
5876.requirement: Complete the story mission Pointed Parley in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 3.

5906.name: Woodland Management: Bjora Marches
5906.requirement: Log wood  times in Bjora Marches.

5911.name: Crop Harvester: Drizzlewood Coast
5911.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Drizzlewood Coast.

5920.name: Second Response: Fields of Ruin
5920.requirement: Complete the Fields of Ruin Dragon Response Mission.

6018.name: Crop Harvester: Jahai Bluffs
6018.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Jahai Bluffs.

6037.name: The Outcast Prince
6037.requirement: Hear out Prince Thorn's thoughts on life in the ever-changing Mad Realm.

6044.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Twenty-Nine
6044.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Nine.

6059.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Thirty
6059.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty.

6094.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Aspenwood Passageway
6094.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6135.name: Master Specter
6135.requirement: Completely train the thief's specter elite specialization.

6236.name: Raptor Ride: Chantry of the Crab
6236.requirement: Ride a raptor from Chantry of the Crab to the top of Kaolai Tower in under 1 minute without dismounting or teleporting.

6249.name: Echovald Wilds Insight: Fort Aspenwood
6249.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in the Echovald Wilds.

6360.name: Dragon's End Insight: Shrine Rooftop
6360.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Dragon's End.

6446.name: Evolution within Decay
6446.description: We are all products of our environment.

6579.name: (Weekly) Dragon Bash Festivities
6579.description: Weekly achievement. Progress resets on Monday morning.
6579.requirement: Participate in the Dragon Bash Arena, Dragon Bash race, Moa Racing, and the Hologram Stampede. Progress awarded varies based on the activity.

6640.name: Using Combo Skills
6640.requirement:
Use  combo skill.

<c=@reminder>Combo skills are performed by using a skill marked as a combo finisher while inside a combo field generated by another ability. Check the tooltips for your weapon and utility skills to find potential combinations!</c>

6651.name: Defeating the Destroyers
6651.requirement: Defeat  Destroyer enemy in Mount Maelstrom.

6678.name: Using Emotes
6678.requirement:
Use  emote to express yourself!

<c=@reminder>Emotes allow your character to show their feelings to the world. Type "/emotelist" in your chat for a list of possible emotes.</c>

6739.name: Decade of Champions: Claw of Jormag
6739.requirement: Defeat the Claw of Jormag on the Frostwalk Tundra in Frostgorge Sound.

6764.name: Environmental Protection
6764.requirement: Complete events in Kessex Hills to clean up the devastated area.

6769.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Four
6769.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Four.

6800.name: Lions Rampant
6800.requirement: Complete events during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

6893.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Seven
6893.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Seven.

6909.name: Gyala Delve Siege Turtle Ace: Silver
6909.requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Siege Turtle adventure with a silver rating or better.

6920.name: Special Ops Advanced Course 1
6920.requirement: Complete the assigned tasks to acquire the Special Ops Helmet Locker.
6920.locked_text: Complete Special Ops Basic Courses 1, 2, and 3 to unlock.

6941.name: Defiance Demolisher
6941.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and defeat the final boss while he has ten or more stacks of Dread Defiance.

7042.name: Eternal Protector of the Skyward Marches
7042.requirement: Successfully complete events around the Skyward Marches.

bits.text: Use your skyscale to consume unstable magic.
Help the Astral Ward calm agitated skyscales at Skyward Marches. (Event 1 of 2)
Help the Astral Ward Drive Back the Forged. (Event 1 of 3)
Convince Zaishen deserters not to return to the Forged stronghold. (Event 2 of 3)
Kill the Champion Avatar of Regret. (Event 3 of 3)
Transport the skyscales to western Skyward Marches. (Event 2 of 2)

7060.name: Elon Riverlands Incursions
7060.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Elon Riverlands.

7103.name: Zojja's Journal: Droknar's Light
7103.requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in the Droknar's Light fractal.
7103.locked_text: Unlock by starting the Zojja's Journal collection.

bits.text: Defend Droknar's Light from the Kryptis invasion.
Page Location: Droknar's Light, atop a table worn by winter's bite.
Page Location: Droknar's Light, where prophecy was guided by flame.
Page Location: Droknar's Light, near a forge adorned with weapons of old.

7126.name: Illuminating Skywatch Archipelago
7126.requirement: Transfer power to  lanterns at points of interest in Skywatch Archipelago. These lanterns will only appear after 100% map exploration.

7128.name: A Legendary Path: Astral Gifts
7128.description: This collection can be a useful reference to what's needed for each gift. You may need multiples of some of these items.
7128.requirement: Gather the necessary components and gifts for Astral armors. The wizard smith, Lyhr, can help you craft them in the Wizard's Tower.

bits.text: Refined from 50 Vials Blood, 50 Vials of Thick Blood, 250 Vials of Potent Blood, and 100 Vials of Powerful Blood.
Refined from 50 Bones, 50 Heavy Bones, 250 Large Bones, and 100 Ancient Bones.
Refined from 50 Claws, 50 Sharp Claws, 250 Large Claws, and 100 Vicious Claws.
Refined from 50 Piles of Radiant Dust, 50 Piles of Luminous Dust, 250 Piles of Incandescent Dust, and 100 Piles of Crystalline Dust.
Refined from 50 Fangs, 50 Sharp Fangs, 250 Large Fangs, and 100 Vicious Fangs.
Refined from 50 Scales, 50 Smooth Scales, 250 Large Scales, and 100 Armored Scales.
Refined from 50 Totems, 50 Engraved Totems, 250 Intricate Totems, and 100 Elaborate Totems.
Refined from 50 Venom Sacs, 50 Full Venom Sacs, 250 Potent Venom Sacs, and 100 Powerful Venom Sacs.
Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower can also help create this.
Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower can also help create this.
In the Mystic Forge or the Wizard's Tower, combine 9 Mystic Clovers, a Gift of Condensed Magic, a Gift of Research, and a Gift of Craftsmanship to create the Gift of Magical Prosperity.
In the Mystic Forge or the Wizard's Tower, combine 9 Mystic Clovers, a Gift of Condensed Might, a Gift of Research, and a Gift of Craftsmanship to create the Gift of Mighty Prosperity.
In the Mystic Forge or the Wizard's Tower, combine 12 Amalgamated Essences, an Eldritch Scroll, 50 Obsidian Shards, and a Cube of Stabilized Dark Energy to create the Gift of Expertise.
Lyhr in the Wizard's Tower can also help create this.
Purchase from provisioners in major cities, the Maguuma Jungle, or the Horn of Maguuma.
In the Mystic Forge or the Wizard's Tower, combine a Gift of Skywatch Archipelago, Gift of Amnytas, Gift of Inner Nayos, and Gift of Persistence to make the Gift of the Astral Ward.
Refined from 2 Bloodstone Bricks, 2 Dragonite Ingots, 2 Empyreal Stars, and an Augur's Stone obtained from Miyani or Mystic Forge attendants.
Refined from 100 Piles of Bloodstone Dust, 2 Obsidian Shards, and 10 Thermocatalytic Reagents.
Refined from 100 Empyreal Fragments, 2 Obsidian Shards, and 10 Thermocatalytic Reagents.
Refined from 100 Dragonite Ore, 2 Obsidian Shards, and 10 Thermocatalytic Reagents.
Usually purchased from laurel merchants, fractal vendors, Mastery vendors, and quartermasters across Tyria.
Earned in Skywatch Archipelago by completing all map locations.
Earned in Amnytas by completing all map locations.
Earned in Inner Nayos by transferring power to lanterns.

Sometimes acquired by combining Mystic Coins, Obsidian Shards, Globs of Ectoplasm, and either Philosopher's Stones or Mystic Crystals in the Mystic Forge. Can also be purchased from strike, raid, or fractal vendors.
Refined from 250 Fine Rift Essences, 100 Masterwork Rift Essences, and 50 Rare Rift Essences. Essences can be found by hunting rifts.
Refined from an Amalgamated Essence and a Mystic Clover.
Refined from 1 Ball of Dark Energy and 75 Stabilizing Matrices. Stabilizing Matrices can be found in Chests of the Mists, salvaged from ascended rings, or purchased from the trading post.
Purchase from Lyhr with a Lesser Vision Crystal after completing the Legendary Astral Footprints achievement.
Purchase from Lyhr with a Lesser Vision Crystal after completing the Legendary Astral Stride achievement.
Purchase from Lyhr with a Lesser Vision Crystal after completing the Legendary Astral Grasp achievement.
Purchase from Lyhr with a Lesser Vision Crystal after completing the Legendary Astral Heartbeat achievement.
Purchase from Lyhr with a Lesser Vision Crystal after completing the Legendary Astral Bearing achievement.
Purchase from Lyhr with a Lesser Vision Crystal after completing the Legendary Astral Thought achievement.

7155.name: Weekly Secrets of the Obscure Strike Missions
7155.requirement: Complete  unique Secrets of the Obscure Strike Mission within a week.

7162.name: Mother of Stars
7162.requirement: Explore the fractal-like islands and begin to earn a place with the Rift Hunters.

7219.name: Astral Grasp
7219.requirement: Gather the necessary armor skins and defeat Pherus the Subjugator to unlock the ability to purchase the Arcanum of Astral Grasp from the Wizard's Tower.

7224.name: Bug-Zapped
7224.description: You flew too close to the light.
7224.requirement: Get caught in Nourys's final eye-beam blast.

7313.name: Manifestation Mayhem
7313.requirement: Defeat Isgarren's manifestations without being downed.

7621.name: WvW Rush Sign-Up
7621.requirement: Meet with Captain Magnus in Lion's Arch to learn about the World vs. World Rush event.

7624.name: Bigger than You Remember...
7624.description: If you wave at a Karka Queen, do you think it would wave back?
7624.requirement: Use /wave in front of the Karka Queen statue in the Museum of Curiosities at the Bastion of Knowledge.

7628.name: Ember Bay Incursions
7628.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Ember Bay.

7642.name: PvP Rush Fighter
7642.requirement: Kill, or help kill, an enemy player in a PvP match.

7704.name: Jahai Bluffs Incursions
7704.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Jahai Bluffs.

7731.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Abyssal Edge
7731.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7802.name: That's Quality Armor
7802.description: "Thank you so much. Take a look."
7802.requirement: Collect  unique legendary Obsidian armor skin.

7878.name: League Participator—Conquest Season Forty-One
7878.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-One.

7886.name: Long Division
7886.requirement: While under the effects of a Fool's Tall Tonic, complete any fractal.

7935.name: Seed Generation, Under 3
7935.requirement: Collect all the bags of Choya Seeds in the World 3 Test Zone.

bits.text: Buy from the traveling Potion Cart!
Unlock a chest in a secret cave!
Defeat the oozes in a different secret cave!

8009.name: Spellbombs Away
8009.description: JUST BLOW THE DAMN PYLON, WAYFINDER!
8009.requirement: Use astral spellbombs to damage pylons  times during the "Clear the malignant fog protecting Zakiros" event.

8014.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Citadel of Zakiros
8014.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

8094.name: Northern Shiverpeaks Veteran
8094.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8178.name: Foster Parent
8178.requirement: Tend to the needs of all the rescued plants and animals at your homestead.

8215.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Poky's Perch
8215.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8543.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Forty-Five
8543.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Five.

8635.name: The Wayward Wisp: Wisp Outreach
8635.requirement: Use your warclaw's strong sense of smell to find the wayward wisp.

bits.text: Outreach 1: Connect with the wayward wisp between the Grand Athenaeum and the Laboratory.
Outreach 2: Connect with the wayward wisp atop the vines between the Nexus of Moonlight and the Grand Athenaeum.
Outreach 3: Connect with the wayward wisp overlooking the waterfalls on the eastern edge of the Valley of Agony.
Outreach 4: Connect with the wayward wisp atop the ruins in the Golden Lake.

8650.name: (Annual) In a Cat's Eye
8650.requirement: Using a Chatoyant Elixir or similar effects, visit and pet a hidden cat.

8653.name: (Annual) Choya Carnival
8653.requirement: While under the effects of a Spiked Choya Psionic Tonic, complete the hardest fractal you can.

8720.name: That's What You Get
8720.description: You didn't learn from the thornsprout bloom in the Wizard's Tower, huh?
8720.requirement: "Borrow" a Pale Branch Spear near Gharr Leadclaw.

8726.name: Forced Entry
8726.description: Bava Nisos: Come for the history, stay for the atmosphere.
8726.requirement: Complete the story chapter Forced Entry.

8747.name: Spirit Nutritionist
8747.requirement: Defeat Lextalion without him consuming any spirits.

8774.name: Home Sweet Homestead: Janthir Wilds Lore Collector
8774.description: You learned all the lore; now flaunt it!
8774.requirement: Complete lore collection achievements across Janthir Wilds.

bits.text: It's Going to Be a Long Day
